lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd rs luiBq huie mnu mDukr suK sMpt smwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Ras Loubhit Hui , Manu Madhoukar Soukh Sanpat Samaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The bumble bee-like mind of a Guru-oriented person acquires strange comfort and peace by meditating on the nectar-like dust of the feet of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: prm sugMD Aiq koml sIqlqw kY ibml sQl inhcl n fulwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Param Sougandh Ati Komal Seetalataa Kai , Bimal Sadal Nihachal N Dulaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Because of the influence of strange fragrance and very delicate calmness in the elixir-like Name of the Lord, he resides in the mystical tenth door in such a stable state that he does not wander any more.

lines.gurmukhi: shj smwiD Aiq Agm AgwiD ilv Anhd runJun Duin aur gwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Samaadhi Ati Agam Agaadhi Liva , Anahad Rounajhoun Dhouni Ur Gaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: In a state of equipoise and by virtue of inaccessible and immeasurable concentration, he keeps repeating the sweet rune of Naam continuously.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn prm joiq prm inDwn dwn Awn igAwn iDAwnu ismrn ibsrwny hY ]271]
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Param Joti Param Nidhaan Daana , Aan Giaan Dhiaanu Simaran Bisaraanay Hai ?271?

Shabad OS B.translation: By acquiring the great treasure of the Lord's name who is light supreme and complete in all respects, he forgets all other forms of remembrances, contemplations and worldly awarenessâ€™s. (271)
